comments:
In MarkerView.refresh() there is the line

uiJob.setSystem(true);

Which may happen after the uiJob has run. As a result it is possible that it 
is not being used to decrement the count of jobs and the progress monitor can 
run forever.

Same issue in TableContentProvider(TableViewer, String, 
IWorkbenchSiteProgressService)

This is now causing the TasksView to open with an error on startup as John has 
added safeguards against this. I'll take this one as I want to address it 
before the integration build.

When you start 20040416 with no data in your workbench you get the followign 
exceptions:
